title: Hmong Community Planted Spiritual Roots in Merced Hospital - California Health Care Foundation
author: Avram Goldstein
description: At Mercy Medical Center in Merced, California, the nation's only hospital-based Hmong shaman certification program bridges Eastern and Western-style medicine to meet immigrants' health needs.
cleaned_text: Hmong Community Planted Spiritual Roots in Merced Hospital - California Health Care Foundation
